duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet donors and perform venipuncture for plasma collection.
Monitor donors during the donation process and manage donor reactions.
Perform tasks for setup, verification, operation, and troubleshooting of plasmapheresis equipment.
Stock supplies, break down empty cartons, and dispose of materials.
Record donor pulse, blood pressure, and temperature measures, and enter donor information into the Donor Information System (DIS).
Coordinate donors to donor floor and compensate donors using the Debit Card system.
Support center management in identifying operational opportunities for continuous improvement.
